#A brief description on usage of TimThumb

= Introduction =

How to install and use TimThumb


= Details =

TimThumb can be uploaded to any folder on your site. Upon install, it will automatically create a /cache/ folder which must be writable by the server. If your host server doesn't allow this by default, be sure to change the /cache/ folder permissions to 777.

Access the file with the following parameters...

* src: location of file from doc root
* w: width
* h: height
* zc: zoom crop (0 or 1)
* q: quality (default is 75 and max is 100)
